name: cam_import_by_id
label: Virtual Machine import by ID
description: Data structure describing the attributes required by VM import by ID API in Cloud Automation Manager

attributes.name: cam_cloudconnection_id
attributes.description: CAM ID of the cloud connection used to connect to the cloud where the instance is going to be imported from
attributes.label: CAM Cloud Connection ID

attributes.name: cam_template_id
attributes.description: CAM ID of the import template used as a base for terraform import
attributes.label: CAM IMport Template ID
